document.full_text: moody's cut ireland's sovereign rating by two notches to the verge of junk status on friday and kept its outlook on negative, pushing the euro lower and adding to renewed pressure on the euro zone's weaker countries.
document.title: moody's cuts ireland by two notches, euro falls
lines_and_colors: moody's cut ireland's sovereign rating by two notches to the verge of junk status on friday and kept its outlook on negative, pushing the euro lower and adding to renewed pressure on the euro zone's weaker countries.
